com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages

Class FlowPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages.PageElement<T>
      • com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages.PagePanel<FlowPanel>
        • com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages.FlowPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScrollFlowPanel

    public class FlowPanel
extends PagePanel<FlowPanel>
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band auto-arranging container layout element

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlowPanel

        public FlowPanel(int originX,
         int originY,
         int width,
         int height)

        Constructor that sets the bounds of this auto-arranging container layout

        Default orientation is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL

        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this container layout
        height - The value to set as the height of this container layout

      • FlowPanel

        public FlowPanel(int originX,
         int originY,
         int width,
         int height,
         FlowPanelOrientation orientation,
         PageElement... elements)
        Constructor that sets the bounds of this auto-arranging container layout, sets its orientation, and adds layout element children
        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this container layout
        height - The value to set as the height of this container layout
        orientation - FlowPanelOrientation to set as the orientation of this auto-arranging container layout
        elements - layout elements to add as children to this container layout

      • FlowPanel

        public FlowPanel(int originX,
         int originY,
         int width,
         int height,
         PageElement... elements)

        Constructor that sets the bounds of this auto-arranging container layout and adds layout element children

        Default orientation is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL

        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this container layout
        height - The value to set as the height of this container layout
        elements - layout elements to add as children to this container layout

        Default orientation is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL
